Dear All,

PR #14762 implements a first step into a tactic that computes degrees of polynomials. This PR defines a tactic called compute_degree_le: if the target is of the form (nat_)degree f â‰¤ d, then the tactic tries to prove the goal.

It works with polynomials f that are expressed as sums, differences, products of constants, monomials, powers of X and numerals.

The PR leads to #14040, which is currently WIP, due to some unexplained universe issues interacting with norm_num.

If anyone has any comments on the simpler PR #14762, I would be very grateful!

Thanks!
